propellerimage.cpp
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #include "propellerimage.h"
2 
3 PropellerImage::PropellerImage(QByteArray image, QString filename)
4 {
5  EEPROM_SIZE = 32768;
6 
7  _image = image;
8  _filename = filename;
9  _clkmodesettings = initClockModeSettings();
10 
11  if (_image.isEmpty())
12  {
13  Utility::print_status("EMPTY IMAGE");
14  _valid = false;
15  }
16  else if (_image.size() % 4 != 0)
17  {
18  Utility::print_status("INVALID IMAGE SIZE");
19  _valid = false;
20  }
21  else if (_image.size() > EEPROM_SIZE)
22  {
23  Utility::print_status("Code too long for EEPROM (max "+QString::number(EEPROM_SIZE)+" bytes)");
24  _valid = false;
25  }
26  else if (checksum())
27  {
28  Utility::print_status("BAD CHECKSUM");
29  _valid = false;
30  }
31  else
32  {
33  _valid = true;
34  }
35 }
36 
37 quint8 PropellerImage::checksum()
38 {
39  int checksum = 0;
40  foreach (unsigned char c, _image)
41  {
42  checksum += c;
43  }
44 
45  // Add value of initial call frame
46  if (imageType() == Binary)
47  checksum += 2 * (0xff + 0xff + 0xff + 0xf9);
48 
49  checksum &= 0xff;
50 
51  return checksum;
52 }
53 
54 QByteArray PropellerImage::data()
55 {
56  return _image;
57 }

60  Q_UNUSED(data);
61 }

72 int PropellerImage::imageSize()

83 int PropellerImage::programSize()
84 {
85  return startOfStackSpace();
86 }
87 
88 int PropellerImage::variableSize()
89 {
90  return startOfStackSpace() - 8 - startOfVariables();
91 }
92 
93 int PropellerImage::stackSize()
94 {
95  return EEPROM_SIZE - startOfStackSpace();
96 }
97 
102 quint16 PropellerImage::startOfCode()
103 {
104  int start = readWord(6);
105 
106  if (start != 0x0010)
107  qDebug() << "Code start is invalid!";
108 
109  return start;
110 }
111 
116 quint16 PropellerImage::startOfVariables()
117 {
118  return readWord(8);
119 }
120 
125 quint16 PropellerImage::startOfStackSpace()
126 {
127  return readWord(10);
128 }
129

149 quint8 PropellerImage::readByte(int pos)
150 {
151  return (quint8) _image.at(pos);
152 }
153 
164 quint16 PropellerImage::readWord(int pos)
165 {
166  return (readByte(pos)) +
167  (readByte(pos+1) << 8);
168 }
169 
180 quint32 PropellerImage::readLong(int pos)
181 {
182  return (readByte(pos)) +
183  (readByte(pos+1) << 8) +
184  (readByte(pos+2) << 16) +
185  (readByte(pos+3) << 24);
186 }
187 
194 quint32 PropellerImage::clockFrequency()
195 {
196  return readLong(0x0);
197 }
198 
199 quint8 PropellerImage::clockMode()
200 {
201  quint8 clkmode = readByte(4);
202  if (_clkmodesettings.contains(clkmode))
203  return clkmode;
204  else
205  return 0x80;
206 }
207 
208 QString PropellerImage::clockModeText()
209 {
210  return _clkmodesettings.value(clockMode());
211 }
212 
213 QHash<quint8, QString> PropellerImage::initClockModeSettings()
214 {
215  QHash<quint8, QString> clkmode;
216 
217  clkmode[0x00] = "RCFAST";
218  clkmode[0x01] = "RCSLOW";
219  clkmode[0x22] = "XINPUT";
220  clkmode[0x2A] = "XTAL1";
221  clkmode[0x32] = "XTAL2";
222  clkmode[0x3A] = "XTAL3";
223 
224  clkmode[0x63] = "XINPUT+PLL1X";
225  clkmode[0x64] = "XINPUT+PLL2X";
226  clkmode[0x65] = "XINPUT+PLL4X";
227  clkmode[0x66] = "XINPUT+PLL8X";
228  clkmode[0x67] = "XINPUT+PLL16X";
229 
230  clkmode[0x6B] = "XTAL1+PLL1X";
231  clkmode[0x6C] = "XTAL1+PLL2X";
232  clkmode[0x6D] = "XTAL1+PLL4X";
233  clkmode[0x6E] = "XTAL1+PLL8X";
234  clkmode[0x6F] = "XTAL1+PLL16X";
235 
236  clkmode[0x73] = "XTAL2+PLL1X";
237  clkmode[0x74] = "XTAL2+PLL2X";
238  clkmode[0x75] = "XTAL2+PLL4X";
239  clkmode[0x76] = "XTAL2+PLL8X";
240  clkmode[0x77] = "XTAL2+PLL16X";
241 
242  clkmode[0x7B] = "XTAL3+PLL1X";
243  clkmode[0x7C] = "XTAL3+PLL2X";
244  clkmode[0x7D] = "XTAL3+PLL4X";
245  clkmode[0x7E] = "XTAL3+PLL8X";
246  clkmode[0x7F] = "XTAL3+PLL16X";
247 
248  clkmode[0x80] = "INVALID";
249 
250  return clkmode;
251 }

253 QString PropellerImage::fileName()
254 {
255  return _filename;

258 PropellerImage::ImageType PropellerImage::imageType()
259 {
260  if (imageSize() > programSize())
261  return Eeprom;
262  else
263  return Binary;
264 }
